title: Paaga - Malumalu Orbital
heading: Paaga
intro: Orbital Temple o loʻo i ai e ala i le agalelei, tomai, ma le vaʻai a paaga tulaga ese. Mai satelite faʻainisinia i tala faʻasolopito, mai le tatalaina o faitotoʻa i nuʻu mamao e oʻo atu i le lafoina o miti i auro, o le galulue faʻatasi e faʻalatalata atu ai lenei malumalu i fetu.

riseNy.name: RiseNY&Paaga
riseNy.description: Feso'ota'iga, aafiaga tu'ufa'atasia ma le 3D mata'ina ua fa'aalia ata na fa'aolaina ai le va'aiga a le satelite a'o le'i pa'i atu i le avanoa.

highestMantra.name: La matou Mantra Maualuga
highestMantra.description: Taʻitaʻia e Sathi Roy, faʻafesoʻotaʻi le Malumalu o Orbital ma faʻalapotopotoga faʻaleagaga ma faʻataʻitaʻiga a Initia. Tatala auala i sailiga tupe, fefaʻatauaʻiga faʻaleaganuʻu, ma se faʻaaliga Art Basel ina ua maeʻa le faʻalauiloaina o Novema 2025.

allToSpace.name: Uma i Avanoa
allToSpace.description: Pasila fa'apitoa satelite laiti. E fa tausaga o le galulue faʻatasi o le fausiaina o se faʻasalalauga faʻapipiʻi matala ma paionia le faʻagasologa o le auina atu o ata i le taamilosaga mai le Global South.

isro.name: ISRO
isro.description: Fa'alapotopotoga Su'esu'e Avanoa a Initia. Fa'alauiloa le tu'uina atu mo le misiona a le PSLV o lo'o aveina le Malumalu o Orbital i le la-synchronous orbit ia Novema 2025.

mercosul.name: 13th Mercosur Lua tausaga
mercosul.description: Porto Alegre, Pasila. Fa'atonuina e Marcello Dantas fa'atasi ai ma le fa'atonu fesoasoani Laura Cattani, Munir Klamt, Tarsila Riso, ma Carollina Lauriano.

inpe.name: INPE / ArtSat Workshop
inpe.description: O le au atina'e satelite na fausia i le taimi o le II ArtSat Workshop. Faamaopoopo e Fabiane M. Borges, faatonu e Lázaro Camargo, galulue faatasi e Ítalo Pinto Rodrigues, vaavaaia e Walter Abrahão dos Santos.

solidConcepts.name: Manatu mautu
solidConcepts.description: Na taitaia e Eduardo Dias. O lomitusi 3D uma ma le fa'ameamea fa'ameamea auro e galue mo le fa'atagata fa'atagata, suia miti fa'atekinolosi i mea moni u'amea taua.

ideaSpace.name: Manatu Avanoa
ideaSpace.description: Fa'avae a'oa'oga a Pasila ile atina'eina ole Quebrada Space Programme curriculum, sauni e fa'aoga i tamaiti a'oga maualuga i Pasila.

closing: Fiafia e faipaaga ma Orbital Temple? Aapa atu .

imageAlts.inpe: Logo a le INPE ArtSat Workshop
